name: RK: Rubik`s Cube 3x3
description:
Solve the rubik's cube with lo-fi music
---Controls---
RMB and Drag - Rotating Cube
To turn the sides,  
use the buttons in the menu or the following keys: 
R - Rotate right side
L - Rotate left side
F - Rotate front side
U - Rotate up side
D - Rotate down side
B - Rotate back side
